LanguageData.Magnuassembly_CompProperties_SelfHealOve: The rate at which the hitpoint of this item changes overtime. This effect is unaffected by deterioration, and happens anytime anywhere.
LanguageData.Magnuassembly_Ability_MassPsychicDeafCen: Can't cast before this effect is gone on self. Cooldown remains {0}.
LanguageData.Magnuassembly_ScenPart_FillBattery_Stati: All batteries on map will be fully filled on the game start.
LanguageData.Magnuassembly_ScenPart_WipeoutChunkSlag_: Beginner drop pods will not drops chunk slag.
LanguageData.Magnuassembly_ScenPart_DumpThingsToPawnI: All items will be dumped to pawn's inventory.
LanguageData.Magnuassembly_ScenPart_UnpackMinified_St: Unpack all minified buildings in drop pods.
